data.name: PageTitle
data.value: ITBeard - life and work in IT ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ #stopwarinukraine

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_1
data.value:
Hi! My name is Lex and I am a bearded programmer :)
For a long time I have accumulated a lot of experience, stories and acquaintances, which I share in my show.

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_2
data.value:
The show "ITBeard" is about the life of IT people from the inside and with its episodes tells about programming languages, popular technologies, professions, famous representatives of the sphere and their way of development.
Without any censorship, labels or extra pathos.

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_3
data.value: All of ITBeard's content, together with you, forms a community of like-minded people who can turn this world upside down and change themselves for the better.

data.name: Interview_Paragraph_1
data.value: The main format of the show is interviews. In them, specialists from different IT fields and companies share their experiences. From designers and programmers to CEOs and CTOs, from small startups to market giants. The heroes of the interviews are people with rich life and professional experience, ready to share them with the audience.

data.name: Profession_Paragraph_1
data.value: If you don't know where to go in IT, I'll tell you everything! That's what the "Professions" rubric is for, where we and our guests go over the intricacies of their craft. Each guest in this column is a professional in his or her field, who will guide you along the right path!

data.name: Programming_Paragraph_1
data.value: One of the main tasks of the show is to cover all existing programming languages. And we're pretty good at it, most of the languages are already represented on the channel! Listen to the description of your favorite languages and expand your skills ðŸ˜‰

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Twitter_Content
data.value: On Twitter, Lex speaks uncensored about current affairs, invites new guests for interviews, and generally leads a very toxic lifestyle (WARNING)

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Telegram_Content
data.value: Telegram channel for notifications about new releases and for useful recommendations

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Instagram_Content
data.value: On Instagram you will find spoilers of new episodes, backstage from the shooting, useful storizas and a little more of Lex's life

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Discord_Content
data.value:
The Discord server "ITBeard's Sponsor" is a quiet place for Lex's sponsors and patrons to communicate. You can also contact Lex directly here, discuss releases and projects, and suggest a guest, participate in the recording of the "Beard News".

We look forward to seeing you on Discord!

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Patreon_Content
data.value:
Supporting on Patreon is one way to support Lex. Patrons of the channel get access to a variety of bonus releases in idiosyncratic format and to the "IT Beard Sponsor" Discord server.

Click to learn more!

data.name: ExtraGoodies_Sponsorship_Content
data.value:
Sponsors are the core audience of the channel. Sponsors have access to ITBeard's Discord server, early ad-free viewing of episodes, as well as additional content: extra content for episodes, streamers, etc.

Click to know about all the bonuses for sponsors!
